description_html: The rugs in the Lush Collection embody “echoes of the present”; a series of biomorphic shapes prevalent in our digitally-inspired world. The collection exudes an imaginative visual wit worthy of Carpet Sign’s characteristically luxurious textiles. Defined by alternately geometric/ curvaceous shapes, undulating lines, dazzling color, and a playful use of tints/ gradients, each rug is an optical and sensual experience. Transcending tradition, the Lush Collection is a timeless addition to any environment.
